sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import CrossIcon from "../icons/cross-black.svg"; import moment from "moment"; const CustomerDetail = ({ customer, setCustomerDetail }) => { // console.log("Customer", customer) return (

# {customer._id}

setCustomerDetail(null)} >

{customer.name}

{customer.email}

{customer.phoneNumber}

Address

{customer.address.houseName}

{customer.address.streetName}

Orders

{customer.orders.length}

{customer.orders.map((order, index) => { return ( ); })}
Order ID Total Address Created At
{order._id} {order.OtotalPrice} {order.Oaddress.houseName}
{order.Oaddress.streetName} 		{moment(order.createdAt).format("DD-MMM-yyyy")}
{/* {error && errorMessage()} */}
); }; export default CustomerDetail;
